items.title: Watch: Google DeepMind CEO and AI Nobel winner Demis Hassabis on CBS’ ’60 Minutes’
items.description: The segment ended with a meditation on the future: a world where AI tools could transform almost every human endeavor.

items.title: Anthropic just analyzed 700,000 Claude conversations — and found its AI has a moral code of its own

items.title: Aethir launches AI Unbundled industry alliance for Web3 AI development
items.description: Aethir, a provider of decentralized GPU cloud compute, announced the launch of AI Unbundled, an industry-wide alliance for Web3 AI.

items.title: 2027 AGI forecast maps a 24-month sprint to human-level AI
items.description: The newly published AI 2027 scenario offers a detailed 2 to 3-year forecast for the future that includes specific technical milestones.
